title: Just Do Nothing -  A Concise Guide To Survive Tough Times
description:
Learn how to go from “Hi” to a first date seamlessly in James’ step-by-step guide: https://tnl.life/4662gMd

**🚀** Want to get coached by the TNL team? Book a free consultation call: https://tnl.life/coachinginquiry

🗓️ Check when TNL is coming to your city. Workshop schedule: https://tnl.life/coachingschedule

~ About The Natural Lifestyles ~
The Natural Lifestyles is the leading elite dating company on the planet. We give dating advice to guys for over a decade with phenomenal results. Our live workshops in New York, Barcelona, Melbourne, Sydney, Budapest etc. are highly requested and offer a life changing experience! Only around 80 guys can be taught live each year.

Do you want to step out of your fear and start a new life? Check our website for more info:

channel_info.description: James Marshall, Shae Matthews, Alex León, & Virag Tierra bring you dating videos on how to be natural with women, improve your confidence and go for what you want in life.

transcription: Train yourself to chill. It is a lifetime skill that will mean you'll get extra bits of life. You'll be more effective if you're not dead. The key takeaway that I want you to take from this video is firstly it is not realistic that you will ever reach a point where you are chill all the time, where you are in relaxation and it's also not really realistic to think that you're going to reach a point of achievement in your life where you then just get to go and sit on the beach in Thailand. Like I mean you can like from a from a from a realistic perspective if you have some kind of business that makes X amount of money or you learn to live remotely you could go and live in Thailand now it's not that hard you just get a ticket to Thailand you just get a shack by the beach and stay there. I'm not saying you can't do that but I'm saying that will not be the answer to your happiness. I've tried that I've done I've gone and like done a month where I mean literally in Thailand I'm just like cool I'm just gonna do nothing and and just did that for a few days and then got bored and then was like well I want to do stuff with life and this is not what I this is it's not the like it's such a ubiquitous fantasy. Palm trees island sitting there with either your smoothie if you're the health guy or the cocaine infused Malibu rum coconut cocktail if you're the party guy but whatever it is it's just like the idea that the end point is slothful distraction or just just living in hedonistic kind of sensory experience in a place where nothing much happens and I don't know about you guys but for me I want to move move and I want to change and I want to grow and I want to build things in my life so that's not the answer. Nor is the answer being the the hundred percent not a second wasted optimizer guy right the guy who gets up at exactly the right time does it does all of the effective things in his life and doesn't waste a single second that I think there's very few people who can maintain that it or who can even get there at all and if you and if you set yourself up for that and you fail which I did when I tried to do it daily I failed every day at being perfectly optimized in every second I felt bad and then I created internal stress I created feelings of self-sabotage or self-loathing as I was like you you know you lazy motherfucker you didn't do this you got it you're wasting time in you like it was I was being a bad life coach to myself by negatively chastising myself for not being the perfect robotic human being so it's not either of those ends I think what it is is understanding that throughout any given day if you are somebody who's moving places and you're actually trying to get stuff done stresses will activate the environment or your internal thought processes or emotions will activate these things your body is going to fire off stress responses your emotions are going to get and and and write that into your life as like it's good for you congratulate congratulate yourself or you know sitting in a bath of hot milk eating a lamington but don't do that every day all day just
